meanings.definition: Spin in which the ball rotates backwards while moving forward.
meanings.sent1: The tennis player used backspin to make the ball spin backward.
meanings.sent2: The golf ball had backspin, causing it to slow down quickly.
meanings.sent3: The backspin on the basketball made it look like it was defying gravity.
meanings.sent4: Her backspin on the ping pong ball was so strong, it seemed to defy physics.
meanings.sent5: The backspin on the cue ball made it curve in an unexpected way.

meanings.definition: A shot in which the ball is hit with backspin to make it stop or reverse direction.
meanings.sent1: He used backspin to stop the cue ball right where he wanted.
meanings.sent2: The backspin on the soccer ball caused it to change direction suddenly.
meanings.sent3: The backspin on the marble made it roll back towards the player.
meanings.sent4: Her backspin on the basketball shot made it seem like it was going in reverse.
meanings.sent5: The backspin on the golf ball made it come to a sudden halt.
